SELECT IFNULL(sum(total_price), 0) as 'total_price', IFNULL(sum(real_pay), 0) as 'real_pay', count(pay_cnt) as 'order_cnt', IFNULL(sum(pay_cnt), 0) as 'pay_cnt', IFNULL(sum(meter), 0) as 'meter' FROM ( select DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y%m') as 'tm', a.total_price, a.real_pay, case when a.status >0 then 1 else 0 end as pay_cnt, IFNULL(sum(b.meter), 0) as meter from orders a left join order_item b on a.num = b.order_num WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y%m') = #{year} GROUP by a.num )DB
